entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as Tom Riddle.

entities.name: you
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, whose blood is connected to Voldemort's soul.

relationships.description: Voldemort took a part of the protagonist's mother's sacrifice into himself, creating a two-fold connection between them.
The wands used by Voldemort and the protagonist shared a core, further connecting their destinies.
